What is This?

This page tracks my educational progress as I endeavor to learn more about Computer Science and Finance.

This page takes no small inspiration from Teach Yourself CS.

I keep notes and solutions for my self-study here

Computer Science

note: I quit reading Real World Haskell due to increasing frustration with how the material was presented.

note1: I added Computer Science from the Bottum Up as it is a nice hands-on tutorial writing low-level C programs on Linux.

To be frank, this process is more than a little daunting. I have two small children and my wife has a demanding career of her own. This might take me five years.
